    • Uses of BookieWatcher in org.apache.bookkeeper.client

      Classes in org.apache.bookkeeper.client that implement BookieWatcher 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  BookieWatcherImpl
      This class is responsible for maintaining a consistent view of what bookies are available by reading Zookeeper (and setting watches on the bookie nodes).
